name: Asteroid Shooter (DreamdwellerNirak)
description:
Shoot endless waves of asteroids and enemy ships while avoiding getting hit. See how high you can score!

WASD or arrow keys for movement

'p' key for shooting

you can maximize the game screen if you can's see the entire field by clicking the * ..blue ..* button on bottom right, not the other one. (the other one doesn't work properly)
